e.preventDefault()}>
this.props.setField(e)} name="orderQty" type="number" class="form-control" placeholder="" />
this.postNewCart()}> Add to Cart

); } } export default connect( 'itemDetail, orderQty, idProduk', actions) (withRouter(ShopPage));
